barghuthi.barghuthi_description: Yazan has over 9 years’ financial services experience at top management consultancies such as Oliver Wyman and Deloitte. He is proficient at Javascript, HTML, CSS, React and most front-end frameworks.

mezrin.mezrin_description: Victor has over 10 years’ development experience and ran a top-3 altcoin mining pool (pool.mn) between 2014 and 2016. He is proficient at C++/C, Python, Java, C#, PHP, JavaScript, Solidity.

tabbaa.tabbaa_description: Talal has over 6 years’ experience in financial advisory roles at top tier consultancies (PwC) as well as private investment funds. He is proficient at Python and SQL and is learning front-end development.

marinin.marinin_description: Nick has over 9 years’ experience in designing and developing financial user interfaces. He has developed UI/UX for financial institutions, retail businesses and manufacturers. He is proficient at HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

kolaghassi.kolaghassi_description: Hamzeh has over 6 years’ financial experience at top private equity and financial consultancy firms such as Alcazar Capital and Ernst & Young. He is proficient in financial management and data analysis, with an emphasis on designing and implementing business strategies, plans and procedures.

selikhov.selikhov_description: Aleksey has over 12 years’ experience developing tech solutions for financial institutions. He has delivered full-stack solutions for both banks and investment funds. He is proficient at C++/C, Java, Python, JavaScript, Solidity.

violentov.violentov_description: Ivan has over 5 years’ experience in web programming. He is especially skilled at developing financial solutions and applications. He specializes in full-stack development using Node server-side, and React/Angular/Vue client-side.

bordunova.bordunova_description: Anna is media and communications practitioner over 5 years’ of experience in journalism, PR and social media. Her expertise spans traditional, experiential & digital marketing, with an emphasis on comprehensive internet presence management.

khusyainov.khusyainov_description: Rust has over 7 years’ of experience in graphic design and illustration. He has created high quality content for clients across financial services, retail and sports. He specializes in raster and vector graphics and video editing.

homyakov.homyakov_description: Yuriy has over 7 years’ experience developing  web applications. He specializes in backend development, database design, web applications architecture. He is proficient at Python, JavaScript and Solidity.

shchipanov.shchipanov_description: Nikita has 5 years’ of experience in digital marketing and analytics. He specializes in сonfiguring analytics tools, user acquisition through paid channels and traffic quality analysis.

smirnov.smirnov_description: Aleksey has over 10 years’ experience as a DevOps Engineer and Systems Architect. He specializes in designing and developing high-load architectures. He is proficient in Linux, cloud and infrastructure solutions. He uses Python as his main work tool.
